name: Trash Man: Level 1
description:
A mysterious wizard has stolen Trash Man's treasured trash! Now he must climb trash mountain to claim what was taken from him and avoid the enemies along the way.

First part in the 5 part "Trash Man" series! 

Link to next level:

Level 2: https://gohannoah.itch.io/trash-man-level-2

Other levels in the series:

Level 4: https://lizalitten.itch.io/trash-man-level-4

Level 5: https://illezama.itch.io/trash-man-level-5
